generated.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html class="nu-prefers-color-scheme" lang="en">
<head>
  <link rel="icon" media="(prefers-color-scheme:light)" type="image/png" sizes="32x32" href="/da308c68dbb04fec35be9b27db79fb9d.png">
  <link rel="icon" media="(prefers-color-scheme:light)" type="image/png" sizes="16x16" href="/aa6be09a7aca9ac38bf8496cc2248ba0.png">
  <link rel="icon" media="(prefers-color-scheme:dark)" type="image/png" sizes="32x32" href="/a57462d4883f9a54ef5ca0e56f3deb88.png">
  <link rel="icon" media="(prefers-color-scheme:dark)" type="image/png" sizes="16x16" href="/9df4c4ce60c11fbe3815121f5e80ffb5.png">
  <title>NuML | NUDE Elements</title>
  <meta name="Description" content="Design System Framework for the any scale projects.">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
  <script src="/8361ea490d96e5bcdc2bde43bcf3243b.js"></script>
</head>
<body>
<nu-block responsive="960px|800px|640px">

  <nu-theme hue="272"></nu-theme>
  <nu-theme name="first" hue="232" mod="tone dim"></nu-theme>
  <nu-theme name="second" hue="154" mod="tone dim"></nu-theme>
  <nu-theme name="third" hue="45" mod="tone dim"></nu-theme>
  <nu-theme name="fourth" hue="301" mod="tone dim"></nu-theme>
  <nu-theme name="fifth" hue="96" mod="tone dim"></nu-theme>
  <nu-theme name="sixth" hue="1" mod="tone dim"></nu-theme>

  <nu-attrs for="section" gap="4x" flow="column" width="100%" fill="bg" items="center" padding="8x 2x||4x 2x"></nu-attrs>

  <nu-attrs for="block" width="clamp(initial, 100%, 980px)"></nu-attrs>

  <nu-flex as="section" fill="subtle" padding="8x 2x||0 2x 4x">

    <nu-flex items="center" flow="column" gap="4x||0">
      <nu-svg color="text-soft" width="clamp(initial, 100%, 35)" height="10" id="logo">
      </nu-svg>
      <nu-heading label="NUDE Elements" text="center" hide="y"></nu-heading>
      <nu-block text="w5 center" size="md">
        ...based on
        <nu-mark theme="tone">Custom Elements</nu-mark>
        <nu-el text="nowrap">
          and runtime
          <nu-mark theme="tone">CSS Generation</nu-mark>
          .
        </nu-el>
      </nu-block>
    </nu-flex>

    <nu-card padding="1x 2x" overflow="auto" scrollbar="" width="max(100%)">
      <nu-code>
      <textarea>
        <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/numl/dist/numl.js"></script>
      </textarea>
      </nu-code>
    </nu-card>

    <nu-flex size="xl||md" gap="4x||2x|2x 1x" content="center" flow="row wrap" padding="0|||0 5x">
      <nu-vars pad="1x 2x|||.5x 1x"></nu-vars>

      <nu-btn to="!https://github.com/tenphi/nude" theme="first special" radius="round" padding="@pad">
        <nu-icon name="github"></nu-icon>
        Github
      </nu-btn>

      <nu-btn to="!https://numl.design/storybook" theme="second special" radius="round" padding="@pad">
        <nu-icon name="layout"></nu-icon>
        Storybook
      </nu-btn>

      <nu-btn to="!https://tele.click/nudeml" theme="fourth special" radius="round" padding="@pad">
        <nu-icon name="send"></nu-icon>
        Chat
      </nu-btn>

      <nu-btn to="!https://twitter.com/numldesign" theme="fifth special" radius="round" padding="@pad">
        <nu-icon name="twitter"></nu-icon>
        Twitter
      </nu-btn>

      <nu-block place="relative">
        <nu-btn theme="third special" radius="round" disabled="" padding="@pad">
          <nu-icon name="file-text"></nu-icon>
          Documentation
        </nu-btn>
        <nu-tooltip text="w6 nowrap" size="xxs" place="outside-top">COMING SOON
        </nu-tooltip>
      </nu-block>
    </nu-flex>

  </nu-flex>

  <nu-flex as="section" gap="6x||4x">

    <nu-attrs for="heading" level="2" column="1 / -1" size="h2||h4" text="w6 center"></nu-attrs>
    <nu-attrs for="feature-header" level="3" size="h4"></nu-attrs>

    <nu-grid as="block" gap="2x" columns="1fr 1fr 1fr||1fr">
      <nu-heading>
        With respect to your needs...
      </nu-heading>

      <nu-card theme="first">
        <nu-heading id="feature-header">
          Flexibility
          <nu-icon name="sliders"></nu-icon>
        </nu-heading>
        <nu-block>
          Create virtually any interface you want without writing CSS selectors and low-level
          styles.
        </nu-block>
      </nu-card>

      <nu-card theme="fourth">
        <nu-heading id="feature-header">
          Speed
          <nu-icon name="zap"></nu-icon>
        </nu-heading>
        <nu-block>
          Get production-ready high-quality markup with speed faster than prototyping tools.
        </nu-block>
      </nu-card>

      <nu-card theme="third">
        <nu-heading id="feature-header">
          Compatibility
          <nu-icon name="link"></nu-icon>
        </nu-heading>
        <nu-block>
          Highly compatible with modern JS frameworks. Doesn't use
          <nu-mark>[class]</nu-mark>
          or
          <nu-mark>[data-*]</nu-mark>
          attributes.
        </nu-block>
      </nu-card>
    </nu-grid>

    <nu-grid as="block" gap="2x" columns="1fr 1fr 1fr||1fr">
      <nu-heading>
        All-in-One markup solution...
      </nu-heading>

      <nu-card theme="second">
        <nu-heading id="feature-header">
          Accessible
          <nu-icon name="plus-circle"></nu-icon>
        </nu-heading>
        <nu-block>
          Make your website accessible without fighting IDs and specifications.
        </nu-block>
      </nu-card>

      <nu-card theme="fifth">
        <nu-heading id="feature-header">
          Interactive
          <nu-icon name="mouse-pointer"></nu-icon>
        </nu-heading>
        <nu-block>
          Use widgets to add some dynamics without using composite frameworks or UI libraries.
        </nu-block>
      </nu-card>

      <nu-card theme="sixth">
        <nu-heading id="feature-header">
          Responsive
          <nu-icon name="grid"></nu-icon>
        </nu-heading>
        <nu-block>
          Make your styles responsive to screen width or item state with effort so little you've
          never seen before.
        </nu-block>
      </nu-card>
    </nu-grid>
  </nu-flex>

  <!--  <nu-flex text="w5 center" gap flow="column" items="center">-->
  <!--    <nu-block>-->
  <!--      Just add this script to your page...-->
  <!--    </nu-block>-->
  <!--    -->
  <!--    <nu-block>-->
  <!--      or...-->
  <!--    </nu-block>-->
  <!--    <nu-card padding="1x 2x">-->
  <!--      <nu-code>-->
  <!--          <textarea>-->
  <!--            $ npm install numl --save-->
  <!--          </textarea>-->
  <!--      </nu-code>-->
  <!--    </nu-card>-->
  <!--  </nu-flex>-->
</nu-block>
</body>
</html>
